name: Shooter Game (itch)
description:
Move your mouse or tap on the screen to play this game. Shots are fired automatically. This is all the game I could make in a week. Story is below.

Aliens are coming to destroy the planet Earth's governing bodies and replace it with their own bureaucratic institutions of societal torture (although considering what they've accomplished, it's got to be better than ours)! You are a smelly, grumpy, and tactless space-marine, and humanities last hope! You have been selected by the most incompetent, lazy, and important people on the Earth to go on a special mission to destroy the alien mother-ship! You agree to go without hesitation when you learn your massive debts will be forgiven should you succeed, and immediately start blasting your way through the countless hordes of alien spaceships!
